The scene shifts to the hospital, where Hunter says to Lei Luo: "Why can't we fight them?" "Right now, all the goods in Hong Kong are in my hands," "All the police in Hong Kong are fed by me," "As long as I give the word," "Even burning down the police headquarters is possible."
Da Wei and A Qi quickly stopped him, saying, "Cool down, cool down, just cool down."
Da Wei said, "Alright."

Lei Luo said, "Do you know why things have turned out this way? Do you realize we're not invincible? Do you know why, despite all we've done, the Englishmen haven't laid a hand on us? It's because everything we do is within some kind of order."

Da Wei walked up to Hunter and said, "Do you know what our bottom line is?" "You crossed the line, you know that?" "You want to kill the police," "The British government won't let us go," "Then everyone will suffer," "What about our brothers, our wives and children?"

A Ping says, "Do you know what you are saying, Lei Luo?" "Do you know? Lei Luo?" "What do you mean by all this?" "Reversing roles?" "The Englishmen are not to be killed?" "When did you become the Queen's heir?" "Come here," "That's my brother in there," "What would you do if it was your son?"
Da Wei said, "I won't kill the police."
A Qi said, "A Hao, A Ping is spitting out blood!"

The scene shifts to the hospital corridor, where A Qi is rushing towards the emergency room. Fat Boy Chao and Piggy follow closely behind. A Qi shouts, 'Call the doctor, call the doctor!' 'Call the doctor quickly!'

movie101_6973286990817002015_5640_5820.text: Piggy said: "What you feared the most is finally happening."

The scene shifts to a hallway where a man is watching TV. The news reports: "Here is a special news report." "Governor Sir Murray MacLehose has announced the establishment of the Independent Commission Against Corruption (ICAC)" "to specifically combat bribery and corruption in both public and private sectors." "Sir Jack Cater has been appointed as Commissioner of the ICAC." "A large number of personnel have been recruited to join the ICAC," "and a statement was made that no personnel will be seconded from the civil service." "This concludes the special news report."
Lei Luo said: "The ICAC," "is probably just a paper tiger." "Even the headquarters had an anti-corruption department before."
The man said: "Independent Commission Against Corruption (ICAC)"
Piggy said: "So what?" "We just give them a bigger share." Ge Bo said: "Dad, I don't think so." "I feel like they are serious this time."
Piggy said: "I don't believe they can deal with all the corrupt cops in Hong Kong." "Who would manage the city's security then?" "Leave it to the gangs?"
Lei Luo said: "Of course." "I will fly to Spain tomorrow." "Let's see if they can catch me and bring me back."
Piggy said: "Those British, nine out of ten are corrupt." Everyone laughed heartily.
The scene shifts to the interrogation room, where the interrogating officer asks Piggy: "Are you the exclusive rent collector for Inspector Lei Luo?"
Piggy said: "What rent collector? I am the landlord."
The man in the suit asked: "Every month, you collect the amount and distribute it to each police officer in the department, right?" Piggy nodded.
Piggy said: "Pay attention" "I have no idea what you're talking about"

The man in the suit said: "Inspector Yan Tong, you have sixteen accounts in Hong Kong. Altogether they hold ninety-eight million in deposits. Under your name are twenty-two buildings and seven luxury cars, including a Rolls-Royce and two restaurants. Your monthly salary is only three thousand two hundred dollars. How do you explain this?"
Piggy said: "I love gambling." "And I'm lucky." "I always win." "I'm nicknamed the God of Gamblers."
The scene shifts to Lei Luo standing on the rooftop, holding a cigar in his mouth, looking around. He then walked towards the edge of the rooftop.

The scene shifts to Lei Luo's home, where Lei Luo says: "This morning, some people came saying they were from the ICAC, asking to take dad for an investigation. Dad got so agitated, that he had a heart attack."
The old man said: "I'm fine."
The old man said: "The ICAC is not a paper tiger." "They even dare to come after me."
The old man said: "Alo" "Go."
The old man said: "Take Snow and the kids with you. Any later, and you won't be able to escape."

movie101_6973286990817002015_5820_6000.text: The car exploded in an instant, and the flames engulfed the entire vehicle.
Rose walked into the living room, Lei Luo sat on the sofa, looking at Rose. Rose walked straight to Lei Luo, who stood up and followed her.
A Hao said: "So late, Brother Lei Luo"
A Hao said: 'Yes, I just wanted to tell you that I've submitted my resignation letter. I'm leaving for Canada tomorrow.'
A Hao said: "Have a safe trip"
A Hao said, 'Let's go together,' 'not just for yourself,' 'but for Ah Qing and the two kids too.'
A Hao said: 'You came in the middle of the night just to tell me this?'
A Hao slowly sat down on the sofa, saying: "I know you're not happy"

Lei Luo said: "No need" "You haven't been happy with what I've been doing these past two months, right?" "You blew up his car, I had people stop him" "You ambushed at the police station" "I had someone whisk him away" "Do you know why?" "If an English cop died, both you and I would be in trouble. Do you understand?"
Lei Luo looked at A Hao with a face full of worry, then turned to look at the sofa. He picked up the glass of water from the table and walked towards A Hao, pointing at him.

A Hao said: "I've received word, the ICAC will move against me in two weeks" "Yan Tong will take my place" Lei Luo looked at A Hao with a serious face, A Hao continued: "Without me, no one can help you." "But you should know," "I'm doing this for your own good."
A Hao looked at Lei Luo with a face full of worry, then turned his head to look at the sofa, saying: "You're doing this for my good" "I’m the tumor" "That’s what you gave me"
Lei Luo said: "That's not how you count brotherhood" "I've already handled quite a lot..."
A Hao said: "You can’t forget, it was you who told me to go to Thailand" "Because of that, my brother Little Wei got killed" "Now my own blood brother lies in the hospital" "turned into a vegetable"
Lei Luo said: "I didn't expect it to turn out like this." "I'm not a god, I can't control everything."

A Hao said: "That's where you’re right, you can't control everything" "Life, we can’t control. Death, we can’t control" "Between life and death, I can control what I’m able to, I can choose my own path" "I call the shots"

Lei Luo said: "So, in the end, it boils down to you saving my life and me ruining yours, right?" Lei Luo walked over to A Hao and continued: "As long as I'm alive, shoot me, it’s fine to kill me with a single shot," Lei Luo said while turning off the floor lamp.
A Hao said: 'Alright,' A Hao raised his gun and pointed it at Lei Luo, saying: 'If you were good to me,' 'you wouldn't have planted a needle by my side.'

movie101_6973286990817002015_6000_6180.text: Lei Luo says, 'Rose, put down the gun.' 'Tell Lei Luo what your name is.'
The scene shifts to a memory where Qing Jie and Piggy are sitting in the kitchen. Piggy is playing with a coin in his hand, and Qing Jie stands up to take the bowl from the table.
Lei Luo said, "Her name is Ah Hua; I raised her." "I sent her to Thailand and Taiwan for training." "By your side." "Someone so capable." "You, Lei Luo, wouldn't waste such talent, would you?"

Lei Luo said, "Alright." "Turning an abused little girl from the old buildings of Kowloon City into a rose, impressive." "But don’t think I don’t know." "Do you know what it means to turn a blind eye?" "Placing a needle by my side." "Do you even consider my feelings?"
A Hao said, "Do you even consider my feelings?" "If Rose wasn't by your side, I would have already been dealt with."
Lei Luo turned around and said, 'A Hao ah...'
Lei Luo looked at Rose and said, "Rose, the two kids won't sleep and want you to accompany them."

Lei Luo said, 'No need.' 'I want to try the feeling of not having a needle by my side.' 'Watch them closely.'
A Hao, who was sitting on the sofa, suddenly felt unwell. He turned his head to look at Qing Jie, then reached out his hand and said, "Get me two headache pills."
A Hao said, 'Okay.'

The scene shifts to a villa where Snow is taking Qing Jie and Piggy to the car. The three children are playing around. Snow opens the car door for Qing Jie, who is about to get in when Snow suddenly says, 'Hey, weren't we meeting at the airport?'

The scene shifts to the dock where Snow is being escorted by Piggy.

The underlings covered their mouths and noses and ran away in panic.

The police sprayed tear gas into the room, and everyone quickly covered their mouths and noses with clothes.

movie101_6973286990817002015_6900_7080.text: A Hao looked at A Qi lying on the ground, then looked up at Lei Luo. Lei Luo was panting heavily, his face covered in sweat.

A Qi's neck was covered in blood, Hunter gently wiped his face, then turned to look at Lei Luo.

A Hao was lying on the ground, clutching his waist. He looked up at Hunter in front of him, then reached out to grab the gun on the ground. Hunter kicked A Hao away.

A Hao lay on the ground, motionless. Hunter shouted: "A Hao!"

movie101_6973286990817002015_7080_7260.text: Lei Luo said: "A Hao, don't push me." "Those around us, all our brothers and sisters, died for us, none left." "Shooting him won't bring them back." "Give yourself a chance." "Give your son a chance." "Give Ah Jing a chance."

In 1974, A Hao was arrested for drug trafficking and sentenced to 30 years in prison. Lei Luo fled overseas and never returned to Hong Kong again. The highest-ranking corrupt official, Hunter, was also brought back to Hong Kong and convicted. The era of corruption under the guise of colonial rule came to an end.

He was imprisoned in a concentration camp, where he was brutally beaten by the guards. The guards interrogated him in the interrogation room, and he was eventually executed.

The screen gradually lights up, displaying the cast and crew involved in the film.
The scene shifts to 1991 in Vancouver, where A Hao is watching TV.
The news reported: "Convicted of drug trafficking, Lan was sentenced to thirty years." "Drug lord Wu Shihao, also known as Hao," "was granted early release due to terminal liver cancer."
The scene shifts to a few years later, with the family of six standing on the deck of a cruise ship, looking at the sea view. The father, A Hao, is standing by the railing, lost in thought.
Lei Luo said: "Is it A Hao?" "Lei Luo."
Lei Luo said: "Brother Luo, how have you been?"
Lei Luo said: "Good." "By the way, have you ever thought about coming out to take a walk?" "The environment here is nice."

The man said: "Right, right." "Smoke less, take care of your health."

movie101_7101937153785102885_3120_3300.text: Qi Jia spread out the quilt on the bed and said, 'Five, increase情趣.' 'Six, you answered correctly.' 'It's still to increase情趣.' 'Seven, still to increase情趣.' Yuan Xiaoou walked in from outside, Qi Jia asked, 'How did you get in?'

movie101_7101937153785102885_4020_4200.text: The two of them ran through the woods, across the bridge, and through the streets. They ran from dawn till dusk, from the city to the seaside, and from the seaside back to the city.

movie101_7101937153785102885_4380_4560.text: Qi Jia said: "If we are about to die later on" "Can you get away from me?" "I don't want others to find us" "and say we died together due to a flood"

movie101_7101937153785102885_4560_4740.text: The scene shifts to a dimly lit alleyway, where a door is pushed open and then shut.

{"caption": "Yuan Xiaoou wrote in the letter: \"Qi Jia, I don't like saying goodbye face to face. Let's say goodbye in this way. movie101_7101937153785102885_4920_5100.text: Yuan Xiaoou was looking at his phone in the crowd when it suddenly rang. He answered the call and said, "Hey, rich lady, what made you think of calling me?"

Do you know why you can’t catch up with Qi Jia, blockhead? It’s not because you’re poor, dumb, and ugly; it’s simple, because you lack the savvy."

Ben Yue said: "The Holy Mother and I are very close" "To ensure my survival" "She told me everything."

movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.text: The three of them were still fighting with the soldiers. Fang Baoyu was holding a knife in one hand and a wine jar in the other, fighting with two soldiers. The two men who had been knocked down by Mulang Shenjun got up again and joined the fight.

Duchess Tuo Chen looked at Mulang Shenjun with a face full of confusion. She didn't know what to do for a moment. Mulang Shenjun gently patted her shoulder and said, "Let's go."
Duchess Tuo Chen took off her cloak and revealed her true face. It was indeed the woman who had been haunting his dreams. Mulang Shenjun looked at her in disbelief.
Duchess Tuo Chen looked at Mulang Shenjun in front of her, her eyes filled with surprise and admiration. She said: "Tuocheng, I never imagined I would meet you here."
Duchess Tuo Chen was frightened by his words, her eyes wide open in shock. She pushed him away and said: "Don't touch me, who the hell are you?"

Wang Dian, with a dagger at Shitai's neck, said to Bai Sankong, "Kill him and I'll release this old nun."

Fang Baoyu said: "Zhu Er, have you really lost your memory?" "You don't remember me?"
Wang Dian laughed and said: "You can't fool me" "Quick, kill that Huyan Dazang now"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: Shitai said: "Remember what I just said."

Bai Sankong said: "Wait." Bai Sankong was about to say something when he was stabbed in the chest by Dazaang. Zhu Er looked at Dazaang in disbelief.
Dazaang said: "Zhu Er" "Zhu Er" "Please beg him to save dad please" "Please beg him, Zhu Er"

Zhu Er said: "I remember you are my dad" "I also remember how you killed grandma with a sword" "Now you don't even spare Shitai" "You are not human at all" "You do not deserve to live" "Your life" "will only bring more harm to others"
Shitai said: "Zhu Er, please beg him for mercy for the sake of our father-daughter relationship."
Zhu Er said: "You killed grandma with your own hands, what family are you talking about?"
Zhu Er rushed over to Dazaang, shouting: "Zhu Er" "Zhu Er"
The scene shifts to Bai Sankong pouring water into a cup.
Bai Sankong said: "I told you, if anything happens to Baoyu, I won't let you go. Your men are all mediocrity. It would be easy for me to kill you."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: Mulang Shenjun said: "Even if I have wealth and power, what use is it without him? If you don't agree with me, we can part ways, and you'll be the one to regret it."

At this moment, the scene shifts to Bai Sankong's residence. A man in black reports: "Sir, Fang Baoyu says he wants to see you." Bai Sankong looks at Mulang Shenjun, who is standing opposite him, with a face full of worry. The scene then shifts to the temple where Zhu Er is lighting incense.

The scene shifts to the room where Zhu Er is burning incense. She turns around and sees Huyan Dazang sitting at the table, holding a teapot. Huyan Dazang asks: "Do you blame me for regaining my memory long ago but never telling you?"
Fang Baoyu said: "I knew it a long time ago; I just didn't say it."
Zhu Er said: "You knew?"
Fang Baoyu said: "That night in the grass hut, your words and actions already gave it away."
Zhu Er asked: "Then why didn't you expose me?"

Fang Baoyu said: "Because during this period, these have been the happiest days since we fell in love. I stayed away from the tumultuous life of the martial world and led a carefree life of planting and tending crops. I didn't want to ruin this harmony."
Zhu Er said: "I also cherish everything here." "But it's all over now."
Mulang Shenjun said: "I've made up my mind." "I want to find the Nine Treasured Swords as soon as possible to fulfill my master's wish and leave the martial world."
Zhu Er said: "But finding all nine treasured swords is bound to be extremely difficult."
Fang Baoyu said: "I know." "Recently, I've heard of a place in southern Sichuan called Jiange that has the remaining six swords." "I wonder if you would come with me."
Zhu Er said: "From now on, no matter where you go, I will never leave you. Even if it's a dragon's den or a tiger's lair, I will accompany you through it."
Huyan Dazang was stunned for a moment, then turned around and walked towards Fang Baoyu. He said: "I came to see you to ask you to release Ben Yue."
Mulang Shenjun said: "Alright, I assume your grandfather already told you that if you want to see Ben Yue, you must bring the heads of Ziyi Hou and Baishui Shengmu in exchange."
Fang Baoyu said: "Don't even think about it."
Fang Baoyu said: "Do you have any other choice?" Fang Baoyu's eyes were filled with anger, but his tone was calm.
The scene shifts to the forest where the bandits are still fighting with the people in white robes. The woman in the forest says: "Isn't that Eight-Armed Divine Ape Li Ziyuan?" "Why is he here?"

The scene shifts to the temple, where Fang Baoyu says, "Tell me, where is Wang Dian? Don't try any tricks."

Li Xiaoran said, "I have other things to do." "I helped you kill him. You helped bandage my wound." "We owe each other nothing."

Li Xiaoran said, "He deserved to die."

Li Xiaoran said, "I'm going to follow you." "You have to help me explain." "You killed the person. It has nothing to do with me." "Otherwise, people will think I'm your accomplice." "I couldn't clear my name even if I jumped into the Yellow River."

Servant said, "I hope the Lord will grant this wish."

Hearing this, Li Xiaoran's eyes were filled with tears, but he still said to Zhu Er, 'You should leave.'
Zhu Er said, "How many times do I have to tell you, you killed Li Xiaoran, I have no way to survive if I go back."
Li Xiaoran said, "I'm going to a duel this time. My life is uncertain. Thank you for taking care of me these past few days. Please, go back."
Zhu Er said, 'If you keep fighting like this, one day you'll die.'
Li Xiaoran said: "To die for the way of the sword, I have no regrets."
Zhu Er asked, "What about your family?"
Li Xiaoran replied, "I have no family."
Zhu Er said, "Surely you have friends who are worried about you."
Li Xiaoran said: "Friend?" "Speaking of friends, you're the only one."
Huyan Dacang said, "I won't let you leave."

Zhu Er said, "You would even kill friends."
Li Xiaoran said: "My Lord, I presume you are already aware of my request."
Li Xiaoran said: "I'm sorry, Brother Wang, I no longer concern myself with the matters of the martial world."

Li Xiaoran said: "But this concerns the honor and disgrace of the martial arts world in the Central Plains." "The one renowned as the best swordfighter, Purple Marquis," "isn't willing to fight for the justice of the martial world?"
Li Xiaoran said: "Brother Wang, to be honest, I really don't enjoy the days filled with fighting and killing, moreover, what if I were the best in the world at martial arts."
Li Xiaoran said, "I would like to show the Marquis something, please."
Fang Baoyu said, "Please, Marquis, come out of retirement."

The soldiers of the Tang Dynasty were still in a state of disarray, and the Tang Dynasty army was already at the gates of Chang'an. The soldiers were shooting arrows wildly at the fleeing people.

The scene shifts to the courtyard where Yan Zhu is standing in front of a group of soldiers. He looks at the woman in front of him, who is none other than the current ruler of the Western Regions Protectorate, Huyan Dazong.
The scene shifts to Yan Zhu and his group returning to the village. Yan Zhu and his group found Yan Zhu lying on the ground in the house. Yan Zhu was calling out for Yan Zhu's name.

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: Yan Zhu said: "Yan Zhu"
Yan Zhu said: "Purple Marquis, am I about to die?" "I really didn't expect my father to still be alive."
The man said: "You will be fine, trust me, you will be fine."
Yan Zhu was stunned for a moment, then slowly opened her eyes. She looked at the person in front of her and said: "Yan Zhu, is it really you?"
Fang Baoyu said: "Do not come any closer."
Bai Sankong said: "She is really my daughter."
Yan Zhu drew her sword and asked: "What are you doing here?" "So the Swordsman of Qingping is indeed not dead." "What do you want?"
Bai Sankong said: "I am here to find my daughter." "I want to talk to her alone."
Yan Zhu said: "Purple Marquis, please step out for a moment." Bai Sankong looked at Yan Zhu in surprise, then turned to leave. Fang Baoyu and Da Zang followed Bai Sankong out.

Bai Sankong said: "Yan Zhu, why?" "Why would you rather hide your identity" "and live as the Great Demon Whitewater Saintess of the martial world" "than reunite with your family" "than acknowledge me" "Does it mean you can even abandon your son?" "Why is that?"

Yan Zhu said: "Why?" "Don't you know why?" "When I was at my wit's end, Whitewater Saintess saved me." "I know she is denounced by everyone as a demoness." "But she treated me as her own child. And you?" "You used despicable means" "to separate me from Huo Feiteng, the love of my life, and let him die tragically outside the pass." "Was what you did meaningful? Was it meaningful?"
Bai Sankong said: "If you still recognize me as your father, then you should recognize Fang Baoyu too."
Yan Zhu looked at Bai Sankong in disbelief, while Fang Baoyu and Da Zang were also stunned by Bai Sankong's words. Fang Baoyu said: "What did you say?" "You are my mother?"
Yan Zhu said: "I am Fang Baoyu."
Fang Baoyu said: "Purple Marquis, is this true?"

Fang Baoyu said: "Yes, she is your mother. I wanted to tell you earlier, but there was never a good opportunity. Now that the enemies are at the gates, if I don't tell you now, there may never be another chance. This is also your grandfather's wish."
Yan Zhu looked at Fang Baoyu in disbelief, and Fang Baoyu said: 'No, it can't be. It absolutely can't be.'
Yan Zhu shouted: "Fang Baoyu, no, Fang Baoyu."
Yan Zhu said: "Calm down."
Fang Baoyu said: "Now that your family is reunited, I congratulate you all."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: The scene shifts to the room where Yan Zhu says: "Da Zang, this matter also concerns you." "Please don't leave yet."
The man said: "I am from Penglai, this family matter has nothing to do with me."
Yan Zhu said: "That swordsman Huo Feiteng" "died under your master's sword."
The young man asked: 'What evidence do you have?'

Yan Zhu said: 'Have you forgotten I once inquired about your background? You even told me. You said your master is Gongsun Liang of the Northern Penglai Celestial Sect. Your father and your master both prized their swords. Your father entrusted you to your master on his deathbed, correct?'
Da Zang said: 'Yes, my master told me everything. He said he met my father in the Central Plains.'
Yan Zhu said: "You said the jade pendant you carry" "is the only thing your father left you" "right?"

Yan Zhu said: "The jade pendant is Huo Feiteng's family heirloom. You've always treated it as a talisman. Back in the day, he gave it to me as a token of affection, and I gave it to you on the day you turned one month old. The eagle tattoo on your back is exactly the same as Feiteng’s. I don't know how your master took you to Penglai, but I know you are the child of Feiteng and me. You are my child."
Da Zang said: "So according to you, my master is my father's killer, Baoyu is my brother, and you are my mother. Impossible, I won't believe it."

The scene shifts to Yan Zhu's room, where Yan Zhu is crying out loud. The maid, seeing this, quickly covers Yan Zhu's mouth. Purple Marquis walks in and sees Yan Zhu crying. He asks Yan Zhu what happened.

Yan Zhu looked at Purple Marquis in disbelief, tears streaming down her face. She had never seen him like this before. She knew that she had done something wrong, but she didn't expect him to react this way.
Da Zang's eyes were filled with tears as he played the zither.
The man said: "Bai Sankong, you're in quite high spirits today."
Bai Sankong sat on the pavilion, and Mulang Shenjun walked up to him and said: 'May I have the honor of hearing you play a piece today?'
Bai Sankong said: 'The ancients played the zither for their own amusement, not for others. I’m just playing by myself today. However, I know you appreciate good music, sir.'

movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: Supervisor said: "I'm just here for the fun."
Bai Sankong said: "However, since the Supervisor has said so," "if I don't give face," "it would be too disrespectful."
The supervisor looked at Bai Sankong with a face full of disdain, but Bai Sankong did not care about him, continuing to play the zither.

The supervisor looked at Bai Sankong with a smile, Bai Sankong also gave him a look, then the supervisor turned his head to look at the lute player. The lute player was playing the lute with his left hand, and the supervisor's robe was embroidered with golden phoenixes.
The Supervisor looked at Bai Sankong with a smile, Bai Sankong also gave him a cold look in return. The Supervisor then turned his gaze to the lute player, who was skillfully plucking the strings.
Supervisor said: "Mr. Bai Sankong, using this much force, aren't you afraid of destroying this ancient Song Dynasty zither?"
Bai Sankong said: "Unexpectedly, it seems even you, esteemed sir, understand zithers."

The supervisor said: "The satin patterns on the zither face must be snake belly stripes, right?" "It should be from the Tang or Song Dynasty." "Bai Sankong, using such a precious zither," "must have a high level of mastery."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1680_1860.text: Mo Han said: "I'm not dead yet, don't be sad. Even if I die, it's deserved."
Lin Lin said, "I can never repay you for your kindness in this lifetime."
Mo Han said: "Don't mention that." "Do you remember 'The Peony Pavilion'?" "The living can die, the dead can live." "Maybe everything is destined."
Lin Lin was about to cry, she wiped her tears and continued to feed Mo Han. At this moment, Lu Xiao came in with a nurse. Lu Xiao said, "Lin Lin, let me do it."
At this moment, there was a knock on the door. Lu Xiao said, "Secretary Yang, the commander-in-chief is here to see you."
Lu Xiao said, "Lin Lin, let me do it. Look how tired you've become these past few days."
Lin Lin said: "I want to give everything to the person who has given their life for me."
Lin Lin said: "That's too complicated for me to understand. All I know is, as a man, I can't always let a girl accompany me.""Isn't that right, Secretary Yang?"
Lin Lin said: "What nonsense are you talking about? Who let you in?"
Lin Lin said: "I will move him to my room tomorrow" "and accompany him every day."
Lu Xiao walked in and said: "Lin Lin, don't joke around."
Lin Lin said: "I mean what I say."
Che Zhen Shan said to Lu Xiao: "Lu Xiao, you should go and take care of that matter." "Hurry up."

Lu Xiao, after hearing this, turned and left. The two officers exchanged a glance, then Lu Xiao walked over to Lin Lin and said, "Secretary Yang, that's just the way Lu Xiao is. Don't take it to heart."
Lu Xiao said: "Lin Lin, let me do it."
Lin Lin said: "No need." Lin Lin turned around to leave, but Lu Xiao followed her.
Lu Xiao sat down and asked, "Che Zhen Shan, how are you feeling?"
Mo Han said: "Commander, I'm sorry for causing you trouble."
Lu Xiao said: "Don't think too much, just focus on healing."
The scene shifts to Lu Xiao's room, where Lu Xiao is pacing back and forth anxiously. Che Zhen Shan asks, "What? The bandit escaped?"
Lu Xiao said: "The checkpoint at Dongda bridge says, ""They escaped by boat last night.""They even kidnapped a hostage as a cover."
Che Zhen Shan said: "Such elusive behavior, it's not a common bandit." "Could it be the Communist Party?"

Lu Xiao said: "But why would the Communist Party kidnap my daughter?"Not killing her or doing anything cruel and unusual,""just for a hundred taels of gold? Is that possible?""If they're not after gold, then what are they after?"
Lu Xiao said, "They also kidnapped a businessman's daughter not too long ago."
The scene switches to Lu Xiao saying: "Oh, it seems like they are really bandits after all."

movie101_7176565114756137528_1860_2040.text: Lin Lin walked into the room carrying a book, placed it on the table, and then sat down to read.
Mo Han said: "This music is so nice." "Lin Lin, I think I should go back." "Living here is not very convenient." "You need to work and take care of me."
Lin Lin said: 'Don't get your wires crossed. I'll be fine right away.' Lin Lin turned around and left, leaving Mo Han lying on the bed, confused.
Mo Han said: "Lin Lin, I need to go to the bathroom. Can you help me up?"
Lin Lin said: "Okay." She then turned around and walked to the bed, gently shaking Lu Xiao who was sleeping.
Lin Lin sat down on the bed, Mo Han looked at Lin Lin with a smile, then turned his head to look at the soldier.
Mo Han was about to sit on the bed when he suddenly felt a sharp pain in his chest. He quickly grabbed Lin Lin's hand and said, "Call Lu Xiao!"
Lin Lin said: "Be careful, you go back to bed, I'll call the guard to bring the urinal in."
Mo Han said: "No need, I just didn't walk too well. It's okay now."
Mo Han held Lin Lin's waist and walked towards the door. Lin Lin was about to open the door when she suddenly stopped.
Lin Lin said: "Coming."
Secretary: "Miss Lin Lin, I brought some porridge for Secretary Yang."
Lin Lin ran to the door and said: "I'll take care of it."
Soldier said: "Let me, let me, it's hot, I'll do it."
The scene shifts to a room where Soldier is placing a bowl on the table. Lin Lin says, 'Don't put it there.' 'How could you be so clumsy?' 'Get out quickly.'
Lin Lin said: "Yes, yes."
Lin Lin quickly picked up the photo frame from the ground and ran out of the office. Mo Han picked up the photo frame and saw it was a picture of him and Lin Lin together.
The scene shifts to the entrance of the military camp, where a Soldier is on duty. At this moment, a Soldier runs over and salutes him.
Soldier picked up the phone and asked: "Where did he say he was going?"
Soldier said: "Said he was going to buy a gift for Miss Lin Lin."
Soldier was about to leave when the phone rang. He picked up the phone and said: "Follow that man with the surname Yang immediately."

The scene switches to Soldier who is on the phone saying: "Do you remember the book I asked you to buy last time?" "Yes, I'm fine now." "Room 305 at the Fokai Hotel, tonight at seven." "Don't worry, I'll be on time."

The scene shifts to a soldier who is on the phone inside the house. He hears the sound of a child crying outside and immediately hangs up the phone. He quickly runs out of the house, and the person on the other end of the phone also hangs up.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: The scene shifts to Lu Xiao, who is standing in front of a restaurant. He looks around, then turns his head and walks into the restaurant. The sunset gradually sets behind the clouds, casting a warm glow over the entire city.
Mo Han said, "Thank you for taking care of me these days."
Lin Lin said: 'The sun sets, but it will rise as usual tomorrow, you say. Once this pendant shatters, will it ever be the same?'
Lin Lin said: 'Why does it have to shatter?'
Lin Lin said, "In times of chaos, who can guarantee that a tiny pendant won't be destroyed?"
Lin Lin said: "Then it should be well protected."
Lin Lin said, "Could you help me put it on?" Mo Han happily helped Lin Lin put on the necklace. Lin Lin looked at herself in surprise, then leaned her head on Mo Han's shoulder.
Lin Lin said, "For a long time, I felt like the most unfortunate person in the world, always unable to move on from the past, afraid to love again for fear of falling back into a life's abyss."
Mo Han said, "Let the past be the past."
Mo Han said, "You only live once, cherish it."
Lin Lin said, "Thank you for giving me the courage to love again, thank you."
Mo Han said, "You gave me a gift, can I take you out for a meal?"
Mo Han said, "Today, huh"
Lin Lin said, "Yes, let's go to the Four Joys Restaurant now, to make up for my past mistakes."
Mo Han said, "I can't today, I have an appointment. Let's change it to another day. I'll invite you."
Lin Lin turned her head and said: "Who is more important than me?"
Mo Han said, "An old friend, we've grown up together."
Lin Lin asked: "Is it your childhood sweetheart?"
Mo Han asked, "What are you thinking?"
Lin Lin laughed and ran away, Mo Han sat there stunned, watching her leave. He looked at the flowers around him, feeling a bit lost.
The scene shifts to Lu Xiao walking through the courtyard. He passed by a window and saw Lin Lin inside. He stopped and looked at Lin Lin for a long time before turning and leaving.
Mo Han ran out of the alley, Lu Xiao quickly followed him. Mo Han ran to the corner of the street, looked around, and then ran into another alley. Lu Xiao also ran into this alley.
Lu Xiao looked up at the sky, then turned his gaze to the fleeing figure of Mo Han. He frowned deeply, his eyes filled with reluctance and regret.
The scene shifts to a dimly lit corridor where a man in a military uniform is seen lying on the ground. The man in the suit grabs him by the collar and slams him onto the ground.
Mo Han's eyes were filled with tears, he looked at the person in front of him, then slowly raised his hand to touch the person's face, but was stopped by Lu Xiao.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2220_2400.text: Lu Xiao said: "Mo Han, Secretary Yang." Mo Han looked at Lu Xiao in surprise. Lu Xiao, holding his wound, said: "I've been shot."
Lu Xiao said: "Why is it you, Lu Xiao"
Lu Xiao asked: "Secretary Mo Han, where are you going in such a hurry?"
Mo Han smiled and said, "I'm just strolling around."
Lu Xiao said: "Do you think I don't know you're heading to room 305 at Fuhkai Hotel?"
Mo Han smiled and said, "Lu Xiao, you seem well informed."
Lu Xiao said: "Speak up, who are you meeting?"
Mo Han said: "Do I need to tell you?"
Lu Xiao said: "Don't play dumb with me. Are you meeting with the Japanese or the Communists? Speak up."
Mo Han said: "Lu Xiao, I tell you, I am Yang Mohan who serves the Nanjing Government."
Lu Xiao said: "A servant of Nanjing Government? Keep dreaming that in your next life. You don’t need to tell me. We'll go back to the regiment and see."
Mo Han smiled and said, "Lu Xiao, why bother? I can tell you, but you can't let Miss Che know."
Lu Xiao said: "What, Miss Che?"
Mo Han said, "Actually, I'm going to meet my fiancee."
Lu Xiao said: "Why didn't you say that earlier? Having a fiancee is a great thing, a great thing indeed. Go ahead, go ahead!"
Lu Xiao said: "Then I'm leaving."
Lu Xiao said: "Go ahead, go ahead." Mo Han left, and Lu Xiao watched him leave.
Mo Han walked through the hotel corridor, stopped in front of a room, knocked on the door, and said, "Room service number 21 is here to deliver your newspaper."
The woman said, "Come in."
The scene shifts to a luxurious room where Mo Han enters, closing the door behind him. Yu Xuan turns around, looking at him with a face full of hatred.
Mo Han said: "Yu Xuan."
Mo Han hugged Yu Xuan tightly, unable to believe that Yu Xuan was really in front of him. He couldn't help but ask, "How could it be you, Yu Xuan?"

Yu Xuan looked at Mo Han with red eyes and said, "Comrade Mo Han, I am here to talk to you on behalf of the organization. Comrade Lao Xu has sacrificed, and the organization has transferred me to replace him."

Mo Han said: "I will be your superior line, do not come to find me unless in special circumstances," "Your subordinate line remains the same, the owner of Mobaizhai, 4321. Maintain phone contact and do not meet easily unless necessary"
Mo Han said: "Yes, I have the password, what is my next task?"
Yu Xuan said, "Unfortunately, that password is a fake."
Mo Han said: "Fake? How is that possible? I saw with my own eyes that they were using the story of West Chamber."
Yu Xuan said, "The moment 4321 relayed to you the password he received, we tried to decode it."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Yu Xuan said, "I received a message," "but realized the translations were incorrect," "so you must go back immediately" "and find the correct password."
Mo Han said, "Alright."
Yu Xuan looked at Mo Han's face and asked, "Are your injuries completely healed?"
Mo Han said, "I'm fine now."
Yu Xuan said, "You need to take good care of yourself."
Mo Han said, "So did I. I thought I would never see you again in this lifetime."
Yu Xuan said, 'I forbid you to talk like that.' Mo Han looked at Yu Xuan in disbelief.
Mo Han turned around and said, "From the day I went north, I never expected to return alive."
Mo Han said, 'You know the risky nature of our undercover work; one day you're alive and kicking, and the next you could be a charred corpse.'
Mo Han, with his head down, didn't know what to say for a moment. He turned around and looked at Yu Xuan, who was standing behind him, and then walked out of the room.
Mo Han said, 'I never thought I'd have the chance to give this to you.' Mo Han handed the necklace to Yu Xuan, who was stunned for a moment before putting it on.
Mo Han said, "Yu Xuan, thought of so much to say but suddenly found herself at a loss for words."
Yu Xuan asked: "Do you feel the burden is too much to bear alone?"
Mo Han said, 'Rest assured, I will definitely complete the mission the organization has entrusted to me.'
Yu Xuan said, "You must return safely, promise me that."
Mo Han looked at Yu Xuan and said, "It's getting late, I should go back now." He then stood up and said to Yu Xuan, "Take care!"
Yu Xuan said, "Wait." Yu Xuan walked up to Mo Han, who was about to leave, and said, "Take care."
Mo Han turned around and left, leaving Yu Xuan standing there, stunned.
Mo Han walked out from behind the flower pot, his eyes fixed on Che Linlin. Che Linlin was also staring at him, and they stood face to face for a long time.
Mo Han looked at Che Linlin in surprise and said, "Linlin, what are you doing here?"
Che Linlin said, "Where is your fiancée? I want to meet her."
Mo Han said, "What are you talking about?"
Che Linlin said: "Yang Mohan, don't play dumb with me. I always thought you were different from other men, a man of your word who doesn't lie."

movie101_7176565114756137528_240_420.text: Che Linlin said, 'Strange, then where have I seen you before?'
Che Linlin said, 'Could it be in a dream?'
Che Linlin said, "In a dream."
Yang Muchen asked, 'Have you ever read Tang Xianzu's 'The Peony Pavilion', Miss Che Linlin?'
Che Linlin said in surprise, 'Mr. Yang Muchen is familiar with it?'
Che Zhenshan said, 'A bit.' 'Love arises without a reason, it deepens once it starts. The living can die, the dead can live, feelings in dreams do not have to be unreal.'
Che Linlin said, 'Mr. Yang Muchen knows a lot about 'The Peony Pavilion.'
Yang Muchen said: 'Mr. Yang Muchen is a top student from Huangpu Academy, isn't he?'
Yang Muchen smiled and said, 'You're too kind, Colonel. I just enjoyed listening to operas since childhood. After graduating from Huangpu, I went to Japan.'
Che Linlin asked, 'Mr. Yang Muchen, you have been to Japan?'
The young soldier said, 'Yes, I studied in Japan. Have you been there too, Miss Che Linlin?'
Che Linlin asked, 'What do you think of Japan, Mr. Yang Muchen?'

Yang Muchen said: 'Japan, it's hard to explain in a few words...' 'The Mukden Incident, the fall of the Three Northeastern Provinces, their crimes are unforgivable.' 'However, not every Japanese person is bad, and...' 'Recently, our leaders are not fully committed to resisting Japan.' 'They believe in 'pacifying internal turmoil before dealing with external aggression.' 'Surely you have heard of this, Colonel.'
Yang Muchen said, 'So from this perspective, whether Japan is good or bad has nothing to do with us. Our greatest enemy at present is the Communist Party.'
Yang Muchen said, 'Come, Miss Che Linlin, let's drink to that.' Yang Muchen raised his glass, and the others also raised their glasses.
Che Linlin said, 'Mr. Yang Muchen knows nothing at all. They say ignorance is no sin.'
Che Linlin said, 'Whether he knows or not doesn't matter. What matters is that he's a heartless Japanese lackey.'

Che Zhenshan said: 'He is just conveying the will of his superiors.' 'A person cannot always control their life in this world, can't your father be the same way?' 'Che Linlin, I think that Mr. Yang Muchen is a very talented man.' 'And a favorite of Director Bai, his future is limitless.'
Che Linlin said, 'What does that have to do with me?'
Che Zhenshan said, 'Che Linlin, you're not young anymore. You can't live in the past forever. You need to think about yourself. After all, we still have to live, don't we?'
Che Linlin said, 'My affairs are none of your business.'
Che Zhenshan said, 'Why are you so stubborn?' 'I'm just looking out for you.'
Che Linlin said, 'If you truly care for me, you would immediately drive that Mr. Yang away for me.'
Che Zhenshan said, 'He is sent by Nanjing, how dare I drive him away?'
Che Linlin said, 'Yes.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2580_2760.text: Lin Lin said: "But I was wrong" "Why did you hide that you have a fiancée" "Why didn't you tell me earlier" "You can say directly if you don't like me" "I didn't force you" "You shouldn't lie to me"
Lin Lin said: "I don't need your gratitude"

Mo Han shouted: "Lin Lin!" Mo Han was about to catch up when he saw Lin Lin running into the living room. He quickly followed her, but when he arrived at the living room, Lin Lin had already disappeared.
Lin Lin covered her mouth and said: "Mo Han, we are now even." "You leave immediately, leave 101 Group immediately." "I never want to see you again."
Mo Han chased after her, shouting, "Lin Lin!"
Lin Lin struggled and said: "Let me go, let me go"
Lin Lin cried out: "Why are you doing this" "Why are you doing this"
Mo Han said: "Things are not what you think"
Mo Han said: "Follow me, trust me"
Lin Lin looked at Mo Han in disbelief, then turned to leave. Mo Han quickly grabbed her arm.
Mo Han's hand was on Lin Lin's shoulder, but he didn't know what to do next. Lin Lin looked at Mo Han with a face full of grievance and tears, then turned her head away.
The two walked into the living room, looked around but did not see anyone, and asked, "Where is the person"

Lin Lin walked in and said: "You are lying to me"

Lin Lin asked: "Then why did you lie to Lu Xiao"

Mo Han said: "I know he likes you" "So I dare not offend him" "You also know that the Nanjing government just issued last month" "Temporary Regulations on the Prohibition of Smoking and Drugs" "If Lu Xiao knows that I sell tobacco" "I"
Mo Han said: "I am telling the truth"
Mo Han said: "I'm telling the truth, what's wrong?"
Lin Lin said: "Nothing, let's go."
Lin Lin turned around and left, leaving Mo Han standing there, looking at her retreating figure. He sighed deeply, feeling helpless.

The scene switches to Lu Xiao and Che Zhen Shan walking in, Lu Xiao says: "Commander, that kid surnamed Yang is too out of line" "He has a woman at home" "Still wants to take advantage of Lin Lin" "What the hell is this."
Lu Xiao asked: "How do you know" "Have you been to his house"

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: The group leader said: "Still the woman who has seen him."
Lu Xiao said: "No, that Yang kid told me himself."
The group leader said: "Since you haven’t seen it with your own eyes, is there any conclusive evidence? Merely on Mo Han's word, you're so readily convinced. Isn’t that a bit improper?"
Lu Xiao said: "Group leader, why do you always side with him?"

The group leader said: "Whether I am siding with him or doing this for Lin Lin, you should be clear in your heart. Ever since Mo Han arrived, look how happy Lin Lin has been. It’s as if we’re back to our childhood days. That’s more important than anything."
Lu Xiao said: "Ever since that Yang guy came, I haven’t had a single good day."
The group leader said: "Lu Xiao, a soldier should be competing on the battlefield, not competing in jealousy. Look at yourself."
The scene shifts to Mo Han's room, where he is sitting on the sofa, looking very troubled.
Lu Xiao said: "What’s wrong with you, not a word for so long? You must be bothered by something, you. You are always so suspicious, always overthinking."
Mo Han took a sip of water and said: "Outside the window, someone is pointing a gun at me."
Mo Han said: "Lin Lin, life is short. Who doesn’t want to fall in love passionately, who doesn’t want to spend a lifetime with the one they love?"

Mo Han said: 'But we happen to live in such times, having today doesn’t guarantee tomorrow. We can hardly ensure our own lives, who would dare to touch love so lightly? Maybe right now, outside the window, someone is aiming a gun at me.'

The scene shifts to Lu Xiao's house, where Lu Xiao walks in with three soldiers. He points at Lin Lin and says: "See, what did I say, confess in front of Lin Lin. Did you go on a date with your fiancée that day or not? Speak."
Mo Han said: "What if I tell you no, would you believe me?" The soldiers outside were about to enter, so Mo Han quickly covered the officer's mouth.
Lu Xiao grabbed Mo Han's collar and said: "You’ve got quite a stiff mouth, huh? If not the fiancée, then who are you sneaking around meeting with? The Communist Party? Do you dare admit it?"
Mo Han said: "Lu Xiao, why should I admit anything to you, what are you to decide?"
The group leader kicked Mo Han to the ground and said: '"Brothers, beat him to death for me."
The soldiers dragged Lu Xiao to the ground, and Mo Han kicked him away. Lin Lin picked up a gun from the table and pointed it at the soldiers, saying, 'Get out.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.text: Lu Xiao looked at Lin Lin and said: "Lin Lin, he is a man engaged to be married, what are you to him anyway?"
Lin Lin pointed the gun at Lu Xiao and said, 'Even if I were a piece of rotten meat, I wouldn't let a fly like you linger on me. Get out.'
Lu Xiao said, 'Fine, Yang. You're lucky this time. We'll see about that. Let's go.'
Lin Lin fired a shot at Lu Xiao, who fell to the ground. Lin Lin collapsed on the chair, crying uncontrollably.
Mo Han, who was lying on the other side of the bed, turned over and saw Lin Lin's back. He sat up and looked at her, then got out of bed.
Mo Han sat up straight, took off his pajama top, and stood up.
Mo Han looked at Lin Lin with a face full of reluctance, but eventually, he still took off his coat.
Mo Han was about to leave when he suddenly heard Lin Lin's voice. He turned around and saw Lin Lin lying on the bed, still asleep.
Mo Han looked around to make sure no one was there, then took out a handkerchief from the sofa, carefully wrapped it, and put it in his pocket.
Mo Han went to the restroom, took out the book given by Lin Lin, and flipped through it carefully.

{"caption": "Mo Han sat on the toilet, flipping through the book page by page. The book read: \"If a son has affection for his mother, he will have it for three years after her death.\" \"Can one truly find such deep affection in the world?\" \"The person who dreams of such things is not a common person.\" \"I, Mo Han, will write about it.\" \"As for the matter of the late Governor of Guangzhou, Feng Hao,\" \"Is it true or false?\" \"How rare it is to find someone like Lady Du in the world.\" \"It's beyond what ordinary people
Mo Han, who was about to leave, heard the noise and turned around. Lin Lin opened her eyes and asked, 'What are you doing?'
Mo Han stood up and said, 'I'm looking for clothes.'
Lin Lin said, "Looking for clothes? They're in the bathroom. You were sick last night, I was exhausted."
Mo Han looked at Lin Lin who was lying on the bed and said, 'Then I'll be going back first.' He then turned off the light and left.
Lu Xiao dialed the number again and said, "Please connect me to 4321."
Lu Xiao's eyes were filled with tears as he listened to the phone. He slowly put down the receiver, his face showing reluctance.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: The scene shifts to Hong Zichen's side, where he is on the phone saying, "Hello, hello."

The scene shifts to a soldier running into the courtyard, stopping in front of a house, and reading the notice on the door aloud: "Due to poor business, the house is for rent. Contact after one week at the Great Medicine Store on枫林路."
The scene shifts to a house where a soldier is looking through the window.
The scene shifts to Hong Zichen who is patrolling the streets. He walked out from behind a pillar, looked around, and saw a man in a hat approaching him.
The man said, "Old Xu, I'm here."
The man said, "Hong Zichen, come on in."
The man said, 'Friend, we've met before, but I remember, you weren't dressed like this at the time.'
Hong Zichen said, "You've got the wrong person."
The man chased after Hong Zichen, shouting, "Hey, friend, don't go, let's have a chat." "Friend, friend, friend, don't leave." "Hey, friend, friend, watch out, friend, hold up."
The two continued to run forward, with Hong Zichen's gun aimed at Man's back. Man, with his back to Hong Zichen, didn't notice anything unusual.
The two stood facing each other, each holding a gun, Hong Zichen took a step forward, Man also moved forward, the two were now in a standoff.
Man said: "Pal, if I reveal your identity, you know what fate awaits you."
Hong Zichen said, 'Bro, you and I, we're cut from the same cloth.'
Man asked, "What do you mean?"
Hong Zichen said, "It's all about money in the end. I'm just doing some business with the Communists."
Man looked at Hong Zichen and said, "Not bad."

Hong Zichen said, 'Bro, in this war between the Nationalists and Communists, who knows who will win. We profiteers shouldn’t be at odds. What's more, revealing each other's identities benefits neither of us.'
Man looked at Hong Zichen with a smile, then slowly closed his eyes.
The man said, "Deal."
The man said: "My friend, from the moment I saw you, I knew we were birds of a feather, lamentably meeting too late."
The man said, "Birds of a feather, indeed." "So, from now on, let’s meet at the place we agreed on earlier, how's that sound?"
Man said: "No problem."
The man said, "Then you go on ahead."
The man waved goodbye to Hong Zichen and ran off. Hong Zichen raised his gun and aimed at the fleeing man. The man ran into a narrow alley, and Hong Zichen followed him.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Mo Han ran over and said: "Che Linlin, how did you get here?"
Che Linlin said: "I saw you being chased on the road so I hurried over. Are you okay?"
Mo Han said: "I'm fine, just a little misunderstanding with an old friend."
Che Linlin said: "I'm glad you're fine."
Mo Han said: "Don't run around like this in the future, ok? It's dangerous for you to come alone. What if you encounter bad guys?"
The man laughed and said: "Friend, see you next time" "See you later"

Che Linlin looked at Mo Han in surprise, then turned to look at Lu Xiao. Lu Xiao nodded at her, signaling her to go home. Che Linlin reluctantly agreed. Mo Han said to Che Linlin: "You go home first. I still have something to deal with the old friend."
The scene shifts to Che Linlin and Mo Han arguing. Mo Han said: "Forget it, let's go home together."

The scene shifts to a soldier standing guard on the second floor of a teahouse. He is staring intently at the entrance downstairs. Inside the teahouse, Che Zhen Shan is sitting at the table, playing with a wooden stick in his hand.
The officer said: "Speak up, who is he? Speak up, and this is yours."
Little Eyed Man smiled and said: "Really?"

The man hurriedly said: "No, no, no, I'll talk, I'll talk."
Che Zhen Shan was stunned for a moment, then said: "You're saying Yang Mohan is a communist?"
Mo Han said: "That's what the informant told me directly."
Mo Han looked at the teacup in his hand and asked: "How much did you give him?"
Mo Han asked: "A gold bar?"
Che Zhen Shan asked: "What's happened?"
The scene shifts to the office where Che Zhen Shan is drinking tea. He looks at Lu Xiao and says: "Lu Xiao, if Mohan was given a gold bar, she would also say you're a communist, you believe it?"

The scene shifts to the office where Mo Han is sitting at the desk, looking at Lu Xiao who is standing in front of him and says: "I know Che Linlin is with Mohan" "You're not happy in your heart" "But you shouldn't use this way to vent your dissatisfaction."
Mo Han said: "Group leader, I will prove it to you."
The scene shifts to the courtyard where Che Zhen Shan and Little Eyed Man are walking side by side. Little Eyed Man suddenly pulls out a gun and points it at Che Zhen Shan's head.
The scene shifts to Lu Xiao handing over a cigarette to Che Zhen Shan. Che Zhen Shan said, 'There is a traitor in your organization.'
Lu Xiao asked: "Who?"

Che Linlin was lying on the bed, her hand resting on her chest. She took a deep breath, then covered her mouth and nose with her hand, and fell into a deep sleep. Mo Han said: "It's dangerous for you to come alone. What if you encounter bad guys?"
Che Linlin was lying in bed, her hand holding a handkerchief tightly.
The scene shifts to the courtyard where Che Linlin is packing up to leave. Mo Han is pacing back and forth in the courtyard, looking around.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3480_3660.text: The scene shifts to Lu Xiao, who is patrolling the streets. He sees Little Eyed Man standing in front of a shop, so he hides behind a pillar to observe him. After confirming that Little Eyed Man is not paying attention, he quickly hides back.
Little Eyed Man turned around and saw Lu Xiao hiding behind a wall. He quickly hid back inside the house.
Little Eyed Man was about to leave when he suddenly heard a noise behind him. He turned around and saw Che Linlin running towards him. Little Eyed Man quickly turned back and ran away.
Che Linlin ran out of the courtyard, and Lu Xiao quickly followed her. He saw Che Linlin running to the gate, but she didn't stop there; she continued running forward.
Lu Xiao, who was hiding behind the wall, saw this scene and was stunned.

Zhang Xiaobao said, "Good, sit here, sit, sit well." Liu Mengting sat on a stone by the stream, Zhang Xiaobao continued, "One, two, three, hmm, looks good."
Zhang Xiaobao said, "Mengting, didn’t you just go into town a couple of days ago? Why are you heading to the city again?"

Liu Mengting said, "Old Lady He is almost out of medicine, Uncle Lin needs to get a senior's card, his daughter needs to apply for a birth permit, and then there's Old Lady Song, who wants me to bring a jar of pickles to her son in the city. Ah, I'm too busy to keep up."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Village assistant? I think you're just a runner and jack of all trades."
Liu Mengting said: "Nonsense," "what I do is all about serving our villagers," "unlike you, all talk no action."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "How have I been all talk no action?"
Liu Mengting said: "You’ve been talking about organizing a beautiful countryside photography exhibition for a while now, but there's been no movement on it yet."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Who says?" "The photos are all ready, look." "Not bad, right?" "Now, my dad is helping me find a venue," "as soon as the venue is secured, the exhibition will start."
Liu Mengting said: "Your dad, your dad, your dad, always bringing up your dad, when will you manage to do something on your own?"

The two walked side by side on the mountain path, with Liu Mengting occasionally looking back at Zhang Xiaobao. After a while, Liu Mengting suddenly stopped and ran ahead, leaving Zhang Xiaobao standing there alone.
The scene shifts to the two walking on the road, with Zhang Xiaobao asking, 'Mengting, you’re always so busy, do you have any plans for the future?'

Zhang Xiaobao said: "Well, my plan is to manage our village's water environment well, make our village a national ecological demonstration village, and then, protect our village's ancient buildings, and also, to develop our village's cultural tourism resources heavily, then let people from all over the country come visit our village."
Zhang Xiaobao asked, "And then?"
Liu Mengting said: "And then, if I get the chance, I would like to go back to school to continue studying my major."
Zhang Xiaobao said, "Still studying, huh? You’ll be an old maid by the time you're done, then how will you marry me?"
Liu Mengting said: "Stop it."

Zhang Xiaobao said, "Hey, Liu Mengting, actually I have my plans too. You know, my dad just bought me a car recently, right? He said he's going to buy me a house too." " Seeing as we’re both not so young anymore, shouldn’t we..."
The two walked side by side, with Liu Mengting urging Zhang Xiaobao to walk faster. They finally arrived at the village entrance, where an old man was sitting on a chair.
The scene shifts to Liu Mengting's home, where she is boiling water in the kitchen. She takes the lid off the pot, picks up the teapot, and pours hot water into the teacup.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Liu Mengting brought the medicine to Auntie He's bedside and said, 'Auntie He, this is the newly bought medicine. It's more effective than the last one. You need to take it once a day. Don't forget.'
Liu Mengting said, 'Okay, I got it!'

The scene shifts to Liu Mengting's home, where Zhang Xiaobao is secretly taking photos of Auntie He and Liu Mengting. At this moment, Chun Hu walks in with a bowl of noodles and says, "Hey, Chun Hu bro, what a coincidence, you're here too."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Yes, Auntie He hasn't been well, so I brought a turtle I raised myself to help Auntie He regain strength."
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Alright."
Liu Mengting said: 'Chun Hu bro, please have a seat!'
Chun Hu said: 'Alright, alright, Auntie He.'
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Auntie He, look."
The man said, "Look, this turtle is so fresh! Auntie He, are you feeling any better?"
Auntie He said: "Much better!"
Auntie He said: 'That's good to hear, it's great that you're recovering!'

Auntie He said, 'Thank you, Chun Hu, you're such a good person. You never forget us old folks, even during holidays you give us red envelopes. Over the past few years, I can't even count how many turtles I've received from you.'

The scene shifts to the announcement board in the village, where villagers are gathered around reading the announcement for the election of the Camellia Village Party Organization. The announcement reads: "According to the requirements of the higher-level party organization, our village will elect the next committee members of the Party Organization."
Bao Liang laughed heartily after hearing this.
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Hey, hey, hey."
Bao Liang said, "You didn't need to bring a gift when you came. Why are you being so polite?"
The man said: 'Director, this is the pig face we cured ourselves at home. You can't find this kind of stuff in Jiangxi.'
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Old Five."
Bao Liang said: "Oh."
The man says: 'Take it to the kitchen and prepare it well. Let's have it for lunch.'
Bao Liang said: 'Okay.'
Zhang Xiaobao said: "Prepare a good bottle of wine, so I can have a drink with Bao Liang."
The two people on the sofa said in unison: "Alright alright alright."
The man in the suit said: "Ah, Bao Liang."
Bao Liang said: "Hey"
Bao Liang asked: "How's business in the first half of the year?"
Chun Hu said: "Not too great, business is tough these days."
Bao Liang said: "You're being humble, aren't you? You've always been the richest person in our village."
The man in the suit said: "Oh, richest in the village?" "I'm barely scraping by." "For instance, I wanted to expand my pig farm."
Bao Liang said, "That's a good thing!"

Bao Liang said, "But dealing with the land isn't easy. The two households living there refuse to move no matter what, causing a big fuss. Today, I'm hoping you, Director, can put in a good word and help my cousin out."
Bao Liang laughed heartily, and Director said, "Bao Liang ah"
Bao Liang said: "Oh."
Bao Liang said, "This timing isn't right."
Bao Liang said: "Ah"
Bao Liang said, "We're in the middle of the village organization election, and since you're my cousin, if I speak up for you"
Bao Liang said: 'Those with ulterior motives will accuse me of favoritism.'
The man in the suit said: "Hey, in our village, with the surname Zhang, going back three generations, aren't we all relatives? Are you really afraid of that?"
Bao Liang asked, 'Do you have some sort of leverage that they're holding against you?'
Bao Liang said, "Leverage? How could that be? My pig farm has all the proper paperwork."
